decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Notwithstanding any indications on the submitted plans, details of the timber front door and window frames and glazing panels and rear UPVC window and door showing sections, profiles, surface treatment, joinery decoration shall be submitted to the Planning Authority and approved in writing before the development hereby permitted is commenced, and implemented in accordance with the approved scheme.  REASON:  To ensure that the proposal harmonises with the character and appearance of the building and the Conservation Area.
description: Replacement of existing windows and door in front elevation of dwellinghouse with timber windows and door to match original style and pattern, and replacement of rear windows and door with UPVC windows
